MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault in the SY13 postcode area of Bettisfield affecting properties in Eatonfield Close, Cambrian View and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:55am. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:44am on 26th January 2021.
